 1  """Views for Zinnia authors""" 
 2  from django.shortcuts import get_object_or_404 
 3  from django.views.generic.list_detail import object_list 
 4   
 5  from zinnia.models import Author 
 6  from zinnia.settings import PAGINATION 
 7  from zinnia.views.decorators import update_queryset 
 8   
 9   
10  author_list = update_queryset(object_list, Author.published.all)

13 -def author_detail(request, username, page=None): 

14      """Display the entries of an author""" 
15      author = get_object_or_404(Author, username=username) 
16      return object_list(request, queryset=author.entries_published_set(), 
17                         paginate_by=PAGINATION, page=page, 
18                         extra_context={'author': author})
